QuestData.Title: Torghast, Tower of the Damned
QuestData.Description:
My allies were taken into the Tower of the Damned, and so we must follow.
I do not think we must venture deep into those halls, which is good as I do not believe either of us is in shape for a fight like that.
Come, let us find our way to one of the most dangerous towers in all of existence.
QuestData.LogDescription: Recover Renathal's Allies from Torghast, Tower of the Damned.
QuestData.RewardText: It is only a matter of time before the Master detects my presence. We must be swift and violent of action if we are to stop Sire Denathrius.

Objectives.Objective: Ascend to the Chamber of Power
Enter the Ritual of Soul Tracing
